desc.zh:
（本作品完全源于架空世界）
       洪港市为国家海岸线上一座特区城市 并于2008年扩市与湖西市（现洪湖以西）合并 近年来以保护净化水资源 建设一座国际一流城市为目标 并以包容 自由的政策快速发展

       洪港市域轨道交通系统（西廷省铁路除外）由洪港轨道交通 洪湖科技交通 与群星交通联合打造
从1991年10月6日开通第一条线路至今（2026.1.22） 共开设23条线路
主要途径区域例如：洪湖半岛老城区 湖西老城区 洪湖东岸CBD区 世贸 国会 东湾新区 城北新区 各大旅游热点     火车站 客运，货运港口 两座机场
为洪港市的建设发展做出极大的贡献
desc.en:
（This work is entirely derived from the fictional world）
        Hongkong City is a special economic zone city on the national coastline, which was expanded in 2008 and merged with Huxi City (now west of Honghu). In recent years, with the goal of protecting and purifying water resources and building an international first-class city, Hongkong City has developed rapidly with inclusive and free policies
      The urban rail transit system in Hongkong City (excluding the railway in the western province) is jointly developed by Hongkong Rail Transit, Honghu Technology Transportation, and Qunxing Transportation
Since the first line was opened on October 6, 1991, a total of 23 lines have been opened since January 22, 2026
Main route areas include: Honghu Peninsula Old City, Huxi Old City, Hong Lake East Bank CBD, World Trade Congress East Bay New Area, Chengbei New Area, major tourist hotspots, railway stations, passenger and freight ports, and two airports
Made great contributions to the construction and development of Hongkong City

        To foreign netizens: The Chinese name of this city is written as' 洪港 ', but the English translation of the Chinese city Hong Kong（香港） is the same as' Hong Kong'. Don't get it wrong

reference: 爱发电,Sun Jan 25 2026 12:29:58 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
